input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product title information.


Product title:
New Vibe Silver Flip Top Lighter - DJ Turntable Record

Product features:
Space Case by New Vibe decorative silver flip top lighter
Image appears on both sides
Ships in a tin box making it a perfect gift idea
Bundled with a Space Case by New Vibe dog tag necklace
Windproof design; removable flint; lighter fluid not included
Space Case by New Vibe lighters designed & printed axclusively in the USA

Product description:
input_text.Response A: It’s a lighter, but not just any lighter. This is a flip top Space Case by New Vibe lighter, with a decorative turntable record design, and it’s silver! This is a windproof lighter, so it’s built to last, and the design is exclusive to the USA. It also comes in a tin box, so it’s ready to give as a gift.
input_text.Response B:
Introducing the New Vibe Silver Flip Top Lighter - DJ Turntable Record, the ultimate must-have accessory for any music enthusiast! This stylish lighter not only looks great, but it also features a windproof design that ensures a reliable light every time.

The sleek silver finish and image of a turntable on both sides of the lighter make it a true standout piece. And, as a special treat, it comes bundled with a Space Case by New Vibe dog tag necklace, adding an extra touch of exclusivity to this already impressive product.

But that's not all - the New Vibe Silver Flip Top Lighter also ships in a stylish tin box, making it the perfect gift idea for any music lover in your life. And, with its removable flint and windproof design, you can trust that it will provide a reliable light every time you need it.

Plus, the fact that it is designed and printed exclusively in the USA only adds to its appeal. So why settle for an ordinary lighter when you can have the ultimate music-inspired lighter that's sure to turn heads? Get your hands on the New Vibe Silver Flip Top Lighter - DJ Turntable Record today and elevate your music experience to the next level!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
